text: Pontanus is a genus of lace bugs in the family Tingidae. There are at least four described species in Pontanus. ==Species== * Pontanus accedens (Drake, 1947) * Pontanus cafer (Distant, 1902) * Pontanus gibbiferus (Walker, 1873) * Pontanus puerilis (Drake & Poor, 1936) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:Tingidae Category:Hemiptera genera
title: Pontanus (bug)
